definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: When PUPU was born he cut his own umbilical cord.
sentences.chinese: 噗噗出生的时候自己剪断了脐带。

sentences.english: The door is closed behind you, and powerful engine purrs to life.

sentences.english: With a continuous supply of bubbles, you might get tired of all that popping.
sentences.chinese: 因为气泡源源不绝，你可能还会听噗吱声听到烦呢。

sentences.english: The warm gases bubbled up through the water.
sentences.chinese: 暖气从水里噗噗地冒了出来。
